desc: Carter and Coles offers a variety of specialty food items and unique gift ideas for everyone. From beverages and snacks, to socks and hats, Carter and Coles has it all! Explore our collection of coffee, tea, popcorn, candy, soups, sauces, desserts, T-shirts, beanies, and general merchandise. You'll be happy you did!

layout.text: We have a wide variety of coffee, tea, and more.
